subsection.name: DPML
subsection.p: OSM is affiliated with the DPML - an open source project developing advanced Java-based component management solutions.

subsection.name: Ibiblio
subsection.p: Ibiblio is home to one of the largest "collections of collections" on the Internet, ibiblio.org is a conservancy of freely available information, including software, music, literature, art, history, science, politics, and cultural studies and host to the OSM collection of component resources and training material.
